trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Use the StyleCollection class to store and manage <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects for a control.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe StyleCollection para armazenar e gerenciar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objetos para um controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Control developers can use this class to contain a set of styles that apply to different portions of the control.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de controle podem usar essa classe para conter um conjunto de estilos que se aplicam a diferentes partes do controle.

trans-unit.source: The collection dynamically increases in size as objects are added.
trans-unit.target: A coleção dinamicamente aumenta à medida que objetos são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Índices nesta coleção são baseadas em zero.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many objects are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>propriedade para determinar quantos objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the StyleCollection methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, use as propriedades e métodos StyleCollection para fornecer a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A>para adicionar um único estilo à coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a style at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A>método para adicionar um estilo de um índice específico na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a style from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A>método para remover um estilo da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the style located at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método para remover o estilo localizado em um índice específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular style is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A>método para determinar se um estilo específico já está na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to retrieve the index of a style within the collection.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.IndexOf%2A>método para recuperar o índice de um estilo dentro da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the styles from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método para remover todos os estilos da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Appends a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta um especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto ao final do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Add para acrescentar especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto ao final do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto à coleção em um local de índice específico, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the style was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual o estilo foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified style is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o estilo especificado está contido dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: O método Contains determina igualdade usando o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> localizar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the style is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estilo for na coleção; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> para um unidimensional <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> matriz, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The style elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> object in the same order in which they are indexed within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos de estilo são copiados para o <xref:System.Array>objeto na mesma ordem em que são indexados dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the copied styles.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos estilos copiados.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `styleArray` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `styleArray` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> class, based on the single element collection returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes*> method.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> classe, com base na coleção de elemento único retornada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes*>

trans-unit.source: The index, from the ordered list of types returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes*>, of the type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> object to create. Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes*> method of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> returns a list with only one type, the input `index` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O índice, na lista ordenada de tipos retornados por <> </> *>, do tipo do <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> objeto a ser criado. Porque o <> </> *> método <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> retorna uma lista com apenas um tipo, a entrada `index` será ignorado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"></xref> types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> can contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz do <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateManager"> </xref> tipos que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> pode conter.

trans-unit.source: An array containing one <xref:System.Type> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> class, which indicates that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> can contain <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz que contém um <xref:System.Type>de objeto para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> classe, que indica que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> pode conter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A>método determina a igualdade usando o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> localizar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of style within the collection; otherwise, -1 if the style is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência de style dentro da coleção; caso contrário, -1 se o estilo não está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Insere um especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> no local do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object at a specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Use o método de inserção para inserir um especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto em um local de índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto no final o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>do objeto, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto a ser inserido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object at the specified index location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto no local especificado do índice de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> at the specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para acessar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz simples.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: O indexador permite que você modifique ou substitua um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto na coleção diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição do índice com base em zero a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> de objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Remove para remover especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que seguem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto são movidos para cima, em seguida, preencha a posição vagas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto em um local de índice específico, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto na coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto no local do índice especificado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object at a specified index location from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o método RemoveAt para remover o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto em um local de índice especificado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que seguem <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto são movidos para cima, em seguida, preencha a posição vagas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection>do objeto, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode remover todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto na coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: A posição do índice com base em zero do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the input <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object contained in the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.
trans-unit.target: Instrui a entrada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto contido na coleção para registrar seu estado inteiro para o estado de exibição, em vez de gravar somente informações de alteração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that should serialize itself completely.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto em si deve serializar completamente.
